item.title: Publications of Interest
item.description: Raptors of Western North America by Brian K. Wheeler. Maps by John M. Economidy [2003]. Princeton Universtiy Press, Princeton, NJ. 08540. (US $71.00). Reviewed by Chris Siddle. This large identification manual (544 pages) covers all 33 regularly occurring hawks, eagles, falcons, kites, harrier, osprey, and vultures from Texas, north to Manitoba, and westward across the continent including the Rio Grande specialities. An obvious strength of this volume is the large number of photos for each species.
